name: Create rows in Google sheets for new Postmark opened emails
description:
Every time an email is opened previously sent via your Postmark, Make will add rows with information on it in your Google Sheets. 
This scenario requires your sheet to be configured like (this)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1E9_pNE9jkU_VzLezevyNusLJ2F0j2h27xR2eUlSDh6k/edit?usp=sharing].
